name: UpdateBlogPostsBatch
description:
Update a batch of blog posts in the CMS.

Use this tool to update multiple blog posts simultaneously in the HubSpot CMS. Ideal for making bulk edits to post content or metadata.

parameters.name: updated_blog_posts_data
parameters.description: A JSON array representing the updated data of the blog posts.

value_schema.description: A JSON array of the JSON representations of the updated Blog Posts.

parameters.name: update_archived_posts
parameters.description: Indicates whether to update deleted blog posts. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Blog Posts. Defaults to `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Blog Posts. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to update deleted Blog Posts. Defaults to `false`.
